pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Mediation Analysis // Used for general multiple mediation analysis. The analysis method is described in Yu et al. (2014) doi:10.4172/2155-6180.1000189 "General Multiple Mediation Analysis With an Application to Explore Racial Disparity in Breast Cancer Survival", published on Journal of Biometrics Biostatistics, 5(2):189.
